feature.label: Pluto Server Feature
feature.description: Defines a generic server for the Apache Pluto portal driver (bundled with Apache Tomcat). The main capability this plugin adds is that it will rewrite the web.xml file of the portlet web application as appropriate when publishing a portlet to Apache Pluto.
